segments.text: My eyes keep drifting back to that poor boy on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so intent on getting those cookies, completely focused on the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that stool, oh, it's tilting precariously backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Its legs are splayed out, making it look incredibly unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Any sudden movement could send him tumbling to the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate too, which might add to the instability.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm imagining the crash, the broken plate, the spilled cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a scary thought, especially with the wet floor nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little sister doesn't seem to notice the danger, only the reward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just looking up with such innocent expectation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole cookie endeavor could end quite badly for them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would stabilize that stool before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
